titles.title: To provide a definition of antisemitism for the enforcement of covered civil rights laws.
To provide a definition of antisemitism for the enforcement of covered civil rights laws.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Government Reform, and Education and Workforce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
